attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.text: Discard 2 basic Energy cards attached to Flareon or this attack does nothing.

data.name: Flareon δ
rules: This Pokémon is both Fire Metal type.

attacks.name: Delta Search
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Holon Energy card and attach it to Flareon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Return Burn
attacks.text: You may return an Energy card attached to Flareon to your hand. If you do, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Fire Dance
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Multi Burn
attacks.text: If Flareon has 3 or more different types of basic Energy cards attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Flareon or this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy card attached to Flareon.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack.

data.flavorText: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

abilities.name: Self-healing
abilities.text: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Flareon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Flareon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Burn Booster
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack. If the discarded card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

data.name: Flareon

abilities.name: Flare Effect
abilities.text: Each of your Stage 1 Pokémon in play is now a Fire Pokémon in addition to its existing types.

attacks.name: Heat Breath
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

data.flavorText: It has a flame bag inside its body. After inhaling deeply, it blows out flames of nearly 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Vengeance
attacks.text: Does 10 more damage for each Pokémon in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

data.flavorText: Inhaled air is carried to its flame sac, heated, and exhaled as fire that reaches over 3,000 degrees F.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Sand-Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Fire Slash
attacks.text: You may discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: Inhaled air is heated in the flame sac in its body to an intense fire over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

abilities.name: Undevelop
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Flareon and put Flareon into your hand. This power can't be used if Flareon is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Evolving Flare
attacks.text: If Flareon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.name: Flareon

abilities.name: Power Cheer
abilities.text: The attacks of your Pokémon-GX in play that evolve from Eevee do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't apply more than 1 Power Cheer Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: If it inhales deeply, that's a sign it's about to attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It has a flame sac in its body. Its body temperature tops 1,650 degrees Fahrenheit before battle.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 10 damage.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard 1 Fire Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack.

data.flavorText: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

data.name: Flareon

abilities.name: Incandescent Awakening
abilities.text: If this Pokémon has a Memory Capsule attached, Grass Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) have no Abilities.

data.flavorText: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon's body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

data.flavorText: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Dark Flareon

attacks.name: Rage
attacks.text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Dark Flareon.

attacks.name: Playing with Fire
attacks.text: Use this attack only if there are any Fire Energy cards attached to Dark Flareon. Flip a coin. If heads, discard 1 of those Energy cards and this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage.

data.flavorText: A Pokémon with a hot temper that can't be controlled once it's angered. Capable of breathing flames hotter than 3000°.

abilities.name: Self-healing
abilities.text: Whenever you attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to Flareon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Flareon.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Burn Booster
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Flareon in order to use this attack. If the discarded card is a Fire Energy card, this attack does 40 damage plus 10 more damage.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

data.flavorText: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

data.name: Light Flareon

attacks.name: Warm Up
attacks.text: If you have any benched Pokémon, search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of them. Then shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Burning Flame
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard a Fire Energy card attached to Light Flareon or this attack does nothing. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 damage for each heads.

data.flavorText: It creates its flames by swallowing air into a special pouch within its body, then heating it to over 3000 degrees.

data.name: Flareon

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon's body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.

attacks.name: Fire Tail Slap
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon .

data.name: Flareon-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Fire Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Blaze Ball
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Fire Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.name: Flareon ★
rules: You can't have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.

abilities.name: Crimson Ray
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you put Flareon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's) is now Burned.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon Star.

data.name: Flareon ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Evolutionary Flame
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play Flareon ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon. That Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Flame Screen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Flareon ex by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Heat Tackle
attacks.text: Flareon ex does 10 damage to itself.

data.name: Flareon-GX
rules: Pokémon-GX rule: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Heat Stage
attacks.text: You may attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Bright Flame
attacks.text: Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Power Burner-GX
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each Fire Energy card in your discard pile. (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

data.flavorText: If it inhales deeply, that's a sign it's about to attack. Prepare to be hit by flames of over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit!

data.name: Flareon VMAX
rules: VMAX rule: When your Pokémon VMAX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Max Detonate
attacks.text: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck. This attack does 100 damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.
